short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It allows you download comments from Youtube video, and import it to your CommentsAnalytics dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Here are the steps to export YouTube comments using the CommentsAnalytics Chrome extension:

1. Install the CommentsAnalytics extension: Go to the Chrome Web Store and search üîç the CommentsAnalytics extension.

2. Open the YouTube video: Navigate to the YouTube video that you want to export comments from.

3. Scroll down until load all comments you want to export.

4. In the Right click window, click on the "Export Comments" button üéØ üöÄ. This will download a JSON file containing all of the comments loaded for the YouTube video.

5. Open the JSON file: Once the download is complete, open the JSON file to view the exported comments  üí¨. You can import it as a new Bulk Request in your "CommentsAnalytics" dashboard.  üí°
